summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QBitMaster French torrent management application. Authentication, navigation, and core UI functionality working correctly. qBittorrent and Jackett integration showing expected errors due to unconfigured services.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests

expected_service_errors.impact: Expected in test environment - qBittorrent not configured
expected_service_errors.workaround: Normal behavior - user will configure qBittorrent later

expected_service_errors.impact: Expected in test environment - Jackett not configured
expected_service_errors.workaround: Normal behavior - user will provide API key later

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepting clicks after form submission
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents some navigation after adding torrents

passed_tests: Login page loads with Connexion/Inscription tabs
Sidebar navigation to all pages (Dashboard, Mes torrents, Tous les torrents, Recherche)
Add torrent dialog opens with Magnet/File options
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal dialog overlay issue preventing clicks after torrent form submission. Consider adding proper loading states and error handling for qBittorrent/Jackett service calls.
